layout.title: com_rsappt_pro3_booking_screen_gad_view_default_title
layout.message: Display the ABPro Graphic Availability Display (GAD) Booking screen

field.name: layout
field.label: View
field.description: Select the view to be used by this menu. (Normal or Accordian)

field.name: hover_open
field.label: Open on Hover
field.description: If Accordion view selected, you can set if the accordion opens when the customer hovers their mouse over a section. No effect on moile devices.

field.name: gad_view2
field.label: Time on Y-Axis
field.description: Display the booking screen with time on the Y-Axis

field.name: res_or_cat
field.label: Screen Display
field.description: Select optional Single Resource, Single Category or Single Service. (for public booking screens only). 'Normal' shows all resources.

field.name: passed_id
field.label: Id
field.description: Enter a resource, category or service id and ABPro will open showing just that single resource, category or service (for public booking screens only)

field.name: serv_first
field.label: Show Services First
field.description: If you are using multiple services and you wish to have your visitor select Service before Resource, set this to Yes

field.name: grid_date
field.label: Grid Fixed Date
field.description: Enter date to override component settings, (ex: 2019-09-14 - yyyy-mm-dd).

field.name: grid_start
field.label: Grid Start Time
field.description: Enter time to override component settings (ex: 13:00).

field.name: grid_end
field.label: Grid End Time
field.description: Enter time to override component settings (ex: 17:00).

field.name: gad_grid_num_of_days
field.label: Grid Days to show
field.description: Override the number of days to show on the grid. Leave blcnk to use Component Config setting.

field.name: res_label
field.label: Resource Label
field.description: Enter a resource screen label to override the language file setting.

field.name: header_text
field.label: Header Text
field.description: Enter header text to override the component level header text.

field.name: footer_text
field.label: Footer Text
field.description: Enter footer text to override the component level footer text.

field.name: spacer
field.label: Section Ordering - Set the order in which sections appear.
